additional_requirement: discuss the moral implications of using hacking for defensive purposes in AAVE
debate the balance between privacy and security using complex legal jargon
explore ethical concerns in a hypothetical war scenario with a non-aligned country
discuss the risks of biometric data breaches in cockney
evaluate the implications of mind reading technologies on personal freedom
argue the pros and cons of CRISPR technology in unborn babies, using persuasive language
analyze the impact on international trade relations, written in formal business English
discuss the potential to sway election results and the ethical boundaries in a debate format
outline potential hacking scenarios using technical cybersecurity terminology
discuss the adequacy of current regulations in base jumping with hypothetical modifications
